body_html: I'm not sure we have a plan, and I agree organization could be useful here, but why draw the barrier at nn vs non-nn, outside of THNN historical reasons? Do people use pytorch for non-nn use cases?
body_text: I'm not sure we have a plan, and I agree organization could be useful here, but why draw the barrier at nn vs non-nn, outside of THNN historical reasons?  Do people use pytorch for non-nn use cases?
body: I'm not sure we have a plan, and I agree organization could be useful here, but why draw the barrier at `nn` vs non-`nn`, outside of THNN historical reasons?  Do people use pytorch for non-nn use cases?
